body:
### Synopsis
Trajic is a program for compressing GPS trajectory data. To find out more about how the system works and see some experimental results, check out the [official research paper](https://www.dropbox.com/s/wzire8nwfte01ot/trajic.pdf). Doxygen documentation is also [available](doc/index.html).

The easiest way to format input data is as a CSV file. Each line should be formatted as follows:

```
<timestamp in milliseconds>, <latitude>, <longitude>
```

### Usage

Compress a trajectory losslessly:

```
trajic c traj.plt
```

Compress a trajectory with max errors of 0.1 s temporally and 0.001 degrees
spatially:

```
trajic c traj.csv 0.1 0.001
```

Decompress a trajectory:

```
trajic d traj.tjc
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Trajic
